message: I mentioned this at an earlier meeting but I didn't have a date for it yet: I'll be hosting a  BBQ for my recently passed birthday up on the roof. The idea is to not just have some food and general merriment but to have a few performances and opportunities to learn something. Right now we've got one or two folks doing music, a skill or two and a DIY photobooth. All AlphaOne members are of course invited and further invited to propose something to teach or show off. Not full classes, maybe just more like a mini-skill session or just set up a little table with something cool on it. There's a Facebook link I'll put up here once I'm not behind the work firewall.
Also: could someone please mention this at the meeting tonight? I won't be able to make it.
What's in it for me, eh? Mentioning it, that is....
Booze and cupcakes, the usual. Except now it's harder and you have to build a time machine to mention it. That's worth at least an extra cupcake.
Thus far we've got basic book-binding and maybes on block printing and knife-sharpening.
Please note that all knife sharpening will take place BEFORE boozing.
Awesome!
Info link: http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=181141521938178
cool, I'll check that out next time I'm in
Thinking of what I can teach / show off... maybe the PsyVision --- or the plug and switch race... that was a hit at our first party.
plug and switch eh? do tell. or link.
its the thing with the plugs and switches on it at the lab... I need to polish it up a bit, will take a picture once its working again.
its like a staff / stick looking thing
the point of it is to switch all of these switches, plug things in etc... and see how fast you can do it.
Got Delorean, made Time Machine, Mentioned it at Meeting. Deserve Cupcape. Talking like wounded Capt. Kirk. Over.
Bad news. Due to bad weather forecast, party is canceled. Going to try again in mid-June.
Party like its June 12th!
here it is! http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=181141521938178
facebook link expired?
Thanks for re-posting! Yes, it's still on. Added bonus: I'll have a big bucket of black dye for resurrecting your old stained/ripped clothes. Call it the NIN Solution: just dye it black!
Careful with that dye, apparently they rent out the roof for weddings, and they would be ripshit if you got any on the roof's paving stones, etc.
yeah, anything died should go into a plastic bag or something, the roof needs to be in cleaner shape than it was when done.
gotcha. I'll have drop cloths down and plastic bags.
On second thought, cancel the dye. What with the possible storms, could be a fiasco.
